record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - June 20, 2008)

[Page: S5947]

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON HOMELAND SECURITY AND GOVERNMENTAL AFFAIRS
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Friday, June 20, 2008, at 10 a.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
